lexUnit.name: heroin.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a highly addictive analgesic drug derived from morphine, often used illicitly as a narcotic

sentence.text: From here comes 80per cent of Britain 's heroin and a quarter of the American supply .

A drugs squad detective has told a fatal accidnet inquiry that the high level of drugs deaths in Glasgow was caused by drugs barons deliberately distributing high purity heroin onto the city streets .
